name: Infrastructure Resources
description: Pay for infrastructure resources by the hour with no long-term commitments. This frees you from the costs and complexities of planning, purchasing, and maintaining hardware and transforms what are commonly large fixed costs into much smaller variable costs.

products.name: Block Storage w/ Standard Backup
products.descriptionHtml: Persistent storage (single data center, 5 days of snapshot backup). Price per GB.

products.name: Block Storage w/ Premium Backup
products.descriptionHtml: Persistent storage (single data center, 14 days of snapshot backup). Price per GB.

products.name: Block Storage for Hyperscale
products.descriptionHtml: Persistent high performance storage: SSD based storage with sustained rates of 15k IOPS. Price per GB.

products.name: Archive Storage
products.descriptionHtml: Per GB Stored for Archived Virtual Machines)

products.name: Object Storage
products.descriptionHtml: Flexible, scalable storage that's S3 compatible. Highly available large file storage accessible via HTTP, with automatic multi-site replication.

products.name: Internet Bandwidth Data Transfer
products.descriptionHtml: Outbound only, inbound is free. Price per GB transferred

products.name: Object Storage Data Transfer
products.descriptionHtml: Outbound only, inbound is free. Price per GB transferred

products.name: VPN Connection
products.descriptionHtml: Site to Site VPN Connection (Does not include bandwidth)

products.name: Private VLAN (Additional)
products.descriptionHtml: 1 VLAN is automatically included with each account

products.name: Public IP Address
products.descriptionHtml: IP Address accessible by public internet

products.name: CDN SSL Delivery with Private Cert
products.descriptionHtml: Per domain (does not include HTTPS delivery)

name: Operating Systems
description: Operating System software licensing. Microsoft Windows prices apply to Windows Server, 2008, 2008 CORE R2, 2008 R2, 2008 Data Center, 2012, and 2012 Data Center. Red Hat Enterprise prices apply to 5, 6, 7.

products.name: Microsoft Windows Remote Desktop Services SAL

name: Managed Operating Systems
description: Prices are for operating system management only. Software licensing is separate.

name: Managed Applications
description: Prices are for both application management and software licensing, unless indicated.

products.name: Managed Microsoft SQL
products.descriptionHtml: Per application instance, plus additional charge for software license â€“ see Software section for pricing.

products.name: Managed Backup
products.descriptionHtml: Price per GB depends on usage. Lower pricing available via contract agreement.

name: Load Balancing
description: Self-service shared or dedicated load balancer options.

name: Quickstart Services
description: Get help with your transition, or simply help speed up the process of adopting our enterprise cloud platform.

products.name: Quickstart Advanced
products.descriptionHtml: Deployment services & best practice consultation to maximize ROI

products.name: Quickstart Enterprise
products.descriptionHtml: Tailored for strategic and/or enterprise orgs who require complex onboarding and/or applicable to customers who have extended onboarding requirements.

products.name: Quickstart SafeHaven Onboarding
products.descriptionHtml: Includes 6 Recovery VM setup. Any Additional Recovery VM setup will be $325 per VM which is a one-time charge.

name: Service Tasks
description: Our team of network engineers have deep operational expertise to quickly and efficiently perform common platform activities. Just give us the details on your request, and within one business day, we'll reply with an estimate, along with a projected completion date for the task. Service task estimation and duties are performed during business hours, 9am-5pm Pacific Time.

products.name: VM Import
products.descriptionHtml: Take a customer virtual machine and convert to either (a) a running virtual machine or (b) a reusable template. Servers converted. The customer will be asked for details about which account, group, VLAN, and storage type to apply to the imported server.

products.name: Deploy Dedicated Load Balancer
products.descriptionHtml: Customer can request dedicated Netscaler, HAProxy, and F5 devices for their accounts. These are best suited to customers who want control over routing management for public or private traffic.

products.name: Deploy Site-to-Site VPN Tunnels or Direct Connect
products.descriptionHtml: Provision specialized site to site tunnels for customers or connect CenturyLink Cloud to hardware in the same data center via Direct Connect.

products.name: Deploy VMWare Virtual Appliance
products.descriptionHtml: Add virtual appliances to an account

products.name: Data Import/Export
products.descriptionHtml: For customers with large data sets to add to (or extract from) the cloud, this content can be distributed via removable media or FTP. This may include data files, virtual machine hard drives (export), or unstructured content. For export where no removable media provided by customer, cost of media added to invoice.

products.name: Move Cloud Servers To Different Data Center
products.descriptionHtml: Customers can request that we move a running, stopped, or archived VM to another CLC data center. Part of this migration includes moving the VM hard drives, setting up the VM in the requested DC, putting it into the specified Group, and joining it to a new network.

products.name: Usage Reporting
products.descriptionHtml: This addresses any request for data that the customer cannot or does not want to retrieve themselves from the platform.

products.name: Disaster Recovery Testing
products.descriptionHtml: Restore premium storage servers in remote DC and verify replication is working properly. This does not include leading any customer-side business continuity execution and represents the CLC portion of the DR exercise only. Servers are started in remote DCs based on account/group/network information provided by the customer.

products.name: Create Cloud Servers
products.descriptionHtml: Customers can pay CLC to build servers based on provided specifications.

products.name: Install, Prepare or Configure Microsoft Software
products.descriptionHtml: Customers who want to run Microsoft software can purchase this work item where we mount ISOs, install software, and configure it.

products.name: Develop Blueprints
products.descriptionHtml: If a customer wants a Blueprint developed, they can pay CLC resources to design and deploy the Blueprint for their account.

products.name: MSSQL Database Mirroring
products.descriptionHtml: Available on both the Standard (synchronous only) and Enterprise Edition of all supported versions of MSSQL. Mirroring synchronizes data from a principal DB to a mirror DB on another MSSQL instance.  Each database retains its own unique connection string, even in the case of failover. Configurable on a per-database basis.

products.name: Add / Install Remote Desktop Services
products.descriptionHtml: Customers who want to run Microsoft Remote Desktop Services can purchase this work item where we will provision RDS licenses for use on CenturyLink Cloud.

products.name: Conference Calls and Guided Troubleshooting
products.descriptionHtml: Participation on customer conference calls and guided troubleshooting sessions.

products.name: NESSUS Security Vulnerability Scanning
products.descriptionHtml: Runs security scans against one or more virtual machines to look for over 65,000 specific vulnerabilities and security gaps. Findings are then shared with the customer.

products.name: Direct Connect Setup
products.descriptionHtml: Provides the planning and work necessary to establish a direct connect between environments via cross connect or MPLS

products.name: SafeHaven Disaster Recovery as a Service Consulting
